title: Reach for the sky (Captioned)
creator_credit: Lewis Gilbert, Daniel M. Angel and Rank Organisation Film Productions
brief_description: The acclaimed film biography of British World War II hero, Douglas Bader, who after losing both legs in an aeroplane crash, overcame insurmountable odds to become one of the most decorated and remarkable fighter aces in history. The film is based on the best-selling biography, “Douglas Bader”, written by Paul Brickhill. The film stars Kenneth More.
